doc.name: loadscript
doc.synopsis: Have WSForm load a JavaScript after Rendering a form
doc.description:
The loadscript option will search for a JavaScript with the same name in the WSForm/modules/customJS/loadScripts folder.

Only use the name. .js will be added to it automatically.

This can be extremely handy if you want a JavaScript to only be loaded with a certain form. Where the JavaScript for example could check form values in on the fly.
doc.note: If the file cannot be found, it will just be ignored.
